Episodes.Title: Bodies in Motion
Episodes.Plot: The two forensic teams come back together under the leadership of Grissom and Catherine just in time to tackle three separate investigations: a murdered couple found in bed in a suspicious trailer explosion; a beautiful stripper discovered dead and dumped in the worst part of town; and two bodies found baked and decomposed after spending five days in the trunk of a car exposed to the hot Vegas sun.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Alex Carter, Roger Aaron Brown, Elise Neal, Christopher Gartin, Kara Zediker, Archie Kao, David Berman, Gerald McCullouch, Bob Clendenin, Tamara Davies, Jamie McShane, Wayne Wilde

Episodes.Title: Room Service
Episodes.Plot: An up-and-coming movie star is found dead in his hotel room after a night of partying with his groupies.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Bite Me
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs investigate a man's claim that his wife fell down a set of stairs in their home.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Alan Rachins, Reed Diamond, Skye McCole Bartusiak, Seamus Dever, Hudson Leick, Abigail Spencer, Marc Vann, Erik Jensen, Archie Kao, David Berman, Jon Wellner

Episodes.Title: Shooting Stars
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs come across an abandoned military compound being used by a small cult. The CSIs grow suspicious when they see that a mass suicide has taken place, but only 11 of the 12 beds are occupied.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Gum Drops
Episodes.Plot: Nick takes the lead on a case where in the house a family of four, three pools of blood are found. Nick thinks that the little girl may still be alive, but Sara is doubtful, thinking that Nick's recent near-death experience is affecting his judgement.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Melora Walters, Michael McGrady, Scott Paulin, Mary Mouser, Jennifer Savidge, Archie Kao, Matt Funke, Trever O'Brien, David Berman, Lindsey Ginter

Episodes.Title: Secrets and Flies
Episodes.Plot: A 28 year-old single mother is found dead. Initially, it's believed to be a suicide, but Catherine determines she was murdered. Also, Ecklie summons Grissom to refute the testimony of an entomologist in a murder trial.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: A Bullet Runs Through It (1)
Episodes.Plot: The team investigates the death of a police officer who died during a shootout, leaving hundreds of bullets on the crime scene. Sofia wonders if it was her who fired the fatal shot.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: A Bullet Runs Through It (2)
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs sift through the overwhelming evidence from a shootout with drug dealers, to determine who was responsible for the death of a police officer killed during the incident.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Dog Eat Dog
Episodes.Plot: Catherine and Brass investigate the case in which a man is found dead in a dumpster. It soon turns out the man had a serious food problem. The trail of his death soon leads to a hotdog-eating contest.Meanwhile, Nick and Sara investigate a not-so-amicable divorce with a bizarre twist. So bizarre it eventually lead to murder when both are found dead and it looks like the dog killed one of them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Hal Sparks, Joel David Moore, Jessica Collins, Angela Goethals, Bill Chott, David Berman, Bailey Chase, Doan Ly, Fatso-Fasano, Daphne Ashbrook

Episodes.Title: Still Life
Episodes.Plot: The CSI's are called out to investigate the disappearance of a boy whose father died four years ago. Soon a couple is arrested at a convenience store with a boy matching the description of the missing kid. The only problem is they both claim it is their son.  Both parents have exactly the same picture of the boy, with a scar on exactly the same place on his face. They hope a DNA-test could confirm who the real parents are, but when this information comes to light, it lead to another bizarre twis
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wallace Langham, Liz Vassey, Heather Stephens, Charles Napier, Jonathan Nichols, Lori Alan, Kevin Durand, Rutanya Alda, Aimee Graham, Archie Kao, Larry Sullivan, Patrick Malone, Jonathan Chapin, Bunnie Rivera

Episodes.Title: Werewolves
Episodes.Plot: The CSI team investigates the murder of a man suffering from a congenital hypertrichosis, causing him to grow excessive body hair.  Elements of the case suggest a connection with a belief in werewolves. The case leads to the victim's sister, who suffers from the same disease.  Because of her condition, she'd been hiding from the world, but it turns out that she's hiding facts that are vital to solving the case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Liz Vassey, Leisha Hailey, Chaney Kley, Eliza Pryor Nagel, Archie Kao, William Allen Young, Bonita Friedericy, Gerald McCullouch, David Berman, Jon Wellner, Palmer Davis, Erik Pal

Episodes.Title: Daddy's Little Girl
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs investigate the stabbing of a motocross racer who was about to leave town with a young woman he had been living with.  Also, Nick comes closer to finding the truth about his kidnapping.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Liz Vassey, Aimee Graham, Taylor Cole, Mitch Pileggi, Rebecca Staab, Joe Manganiello, Archie Kao, Sheeri Rappaport, Gerald McCullouch, David Berman, Timothy Lee DePriest

Episodes.Title: Kiss-Kiss, Bye-Bye
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs crash an elegant party for the city's crème of the crème to discover who killed a young man.  The case gets a bit more personal for Catherine when her father, Sam Braun, is one of the suspects.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Anita Gillette, Faye Dunaway, Scott Wilson

Episodes.Title: Killer
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs must investigate when a party girl is injured and killed in a traffic accident.

Episodes.Title: Pirates of the Third Reich

Episodes.Title: Up in Smoke
Episodes.Plot: The investigation into a body found in a chimney leads the CSIs to re-open an investigation of an unsolved homicide of a female teenager named Caroline Fitzgibbons.

Episodes.Title: I Like to Watch
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs become the focus of a reality TV series, which follows them while they investigate a serial rapist, who recently gained access to a woman's apartment by posing as a fireman.  Also, Warrick's work on the late-shift is causing problems with his marriage to Tina.
Episodes.GuestStars: Louise Lombard, Wallace Langham, Taraji P. Henson, Liz Vassey, Jack Noseworthy, Karis Campbell, Brett Rickaby, Archie Kao, Anna Van Hooft, Larry Sullivan, Graham Beckel

Episodes.Title: The Unusual Suspect
Episodes.Plot: When a student is arrested and tried for the murder of a popular high-school girl, the suspect's 12-year-old sister confesses to the crime.  This results in the judge giving the prosecution 72 hours to re-examine the evidence before the jury delivers its verdict.

Episodes.Title: Spellbound
Episodes.Plot: The team investigates the death of a psychic who "saw" her own death while performing a reading for two other women.  Greg reveals a family secret to Grissom but Grissom believes that science will be what solves the case.

Episodes.Title: Poppin' Tags
Episodes.Plot: The CSI team is lead into the rap music world as they investigate the murders of three street team members.

Episodes.Title: Rashomama
Episodes.Plot: A wealthy defense attorney is killed at her son?s wedding but Nick?s car, containing all the collected evidence is stolen and the case is compromised. After discovering new evidence, the team suspects that someone from the wedding party may be responsible for the murder.

Episodes.Title: Time of Your Death
Episodes.Plot: A high roller who spent the night with a woman he had just met is found dead on the loading dock of the casino where he was staying. The investigation reveals that the victim won $10,000 in a pool game and was an assistant to a respected movie producer.

Episodes.Title: Bang-Bang (1)
Episodes.Plot: A man accused of murdering his wife and co-workers leads the CSIs on a wild ride through a busy casino, eventually barricading himself and a hostage in a casino hotel room.  The CSIs process the evidence from the crime scene to determine whether or not the man acted alone or had an accomplice.  One of the CSIs eventually steps in as a hostage negotiator, putting himself in danger.

Episodes.Title: Way to Go (2)
Episodes.Plot: The CSIs wait by the bedside of one of their own when he's shot in the line of duty. One CSI faces a hard choice by having the power of attorney over their injured friend and colleague. Meanwhile, the team also investigates the strange way of life of one man when he is found decapitated by a train.
